info.author: Pywikipedia bot team
info.description:
A framework for writing robots to crawl Wikipedia set of inter-lingual
encyclopedias, with the goal of standardizing content or otherwise making minor
modifications to the articles of the encyclopedia including making interwiki links.
info.name: PyWikipediaBot
info.platform: All 32-bit MS Windows (95/98/NT/2000/XP), All POSIX (Linux/BSD/UNIX-like OSes)
info.html_description: A framework for writing robots to crawl Wikipedia set of inter-lingual encyclopedias, with the goal of standardizing content or otherwise making minor modifications to the articles of the encyclopedia including making interwiki links.
